data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.actual_result: The channel creation menu stays open
data.expected_result: The channel creation menu should be closed and you should simply return to the channel list where you have to option to create a new channel if you wish to
data.short_description: Channel creation menu doesn't close after creating a new channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a server that you have "Manage Channels" permission for - Go to Server Settings > Channels and press the plus icon in the bottom right corner - Choose to create a text/voice channel, enter a name and press save - Observe that you are back in the channel list and the server creation menu is still open
